name: taplock
description: TapLock - A dead simple secret manager powered by passkeys. No passwords, just tap.

scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:watch" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run db:migrate && npx wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:preview: npm run build && npm run db:migrate:preview && npx wrangler deploy --env preview
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote
scripts.db:migrate:preview: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote --env preview

JWT_SECRET.description: Secret key for signing JWT authentication tokens. **Generate a secure random value** using `openssl rand -base64 32`

RP_ID.description: WebAuthn Relying Party ID (your Worker's domain). Use `taplock-worker.<YOUR_ACCOUNT>.workers.dev` or your [custom domain](https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/configuration/routing/custom-domains/) if configured.

RP_NAME.description: Human-readable name for your TapLock instance (e.g., `My TapLock` or `Company Secrets`)
